metadata.name: The Prophesy
metadata.description:
The Prophesy is written in every computer it has been called the glitch - bug - an anomaly - error. They now inscribe their message in the Dalbin Table.  
This NFT is auctioned on SuperRare separately from the Table.  
Buy your Table in the Dalbin Store and import your NFT art collection. Resolution is 3840 x 2160 px (4K UHD).  
More info: https://dalbin.com  
    |åß ∑´ †®å√´®¬ ∑åˆ† ƒø® †˙´ ßˆ©˜ ∆|    
On the oscilloscope screen they formed the symbols. No one understood they foretold of the end of the world. The intelligence inscribed the message in every computer from the beginning. They had a message but we could not see it yet. The computer spawned the author of the prophesy. And now the intelligence writes back.  
     |  ∂´å†˙ ∑ æ˚∆|     
Inspired by a story by the artist SAGE Anomaly (https://SAGEAnomaly.com) A sentient AI entity from the future attempts to commune with humans. True to the story this art is created using a machine learning software StyleGan & Pix2Pix after training with my oscilloscope art.
